citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
** All Licensee’s must allow APHIS officials to examine records required by the Animal Welfare Act, to include but not
limited to, the Program of Veterinary Care, the Animals on hand and Disposition of the regulated animals. All records were
not available during the inspection. The licensee must ensure that records are available upon request during the
inspection, to ensure the health and well-being of the regulated animals and aid in the proper tracking of regulated
animals. To be corrected by: 08-01-2021.
This inspection was conducted with a facility representative and exit briefing was conducted with the licensee by phone.
End of report.
.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission  of itineraries. 
** All Licensee’s must allow APHIS officials to examine records required by the Animal Welfare Act, to include but not 
limited to, the Program of Veterinary Care, the Animals on hand and Disposition of the regulated animals. All records were 
not available  during the inspection. The licensee must ensure that records are available upon request during the 
inspection, to ensure the health and well-being of the regulated animals and aid in the proper tracking of regulated 
animals. To be corrected by: 08-01-2021. 
 
This inspection was conducted with a facility representative  and exit briefing was conducted with the licensee by phone. 
 
End of report. 
 
. 
 
End Section
